edge: Lara Dutta played the character Mihika Banerjee in the movie.
Akshay Kumar appeared as Lt. Col. Vikram Singh Rana in a cameo role in the movie.
Vinay Pathak played the character Manu Gupta in the movie.
Anil Marwari portrayed the character Taxi Boy in the movie.
Pankaj Jha acted as Inspector Surendra Mishra in the movie.
Brijendra Kala performed the role of K. C. Pant, a train ticket examiner, in the movie.
Rahul Singh played the character Naresh in the movie.
Lokesh Verma portrayed Billu in the movie.
Ajit Mathur enacted the character Pappu in the movie.
Gaurav Gera acted as Gopi in the movie.
Mukesh Bhatt (actor) played the role of Pandeyji in the movie.
Teddy Maurya portrayed Bhaiyaji/Shrivastava Ji in the movie.
Manoj Bakshi enacted the character Jhujjhar Singh in the movie.
Narottam Bain acted as Shivratan/Bablu, a taxi driver, in the movie.
Dadhi R Pandey played the role of Dharampalji, a lorry driver, in the movie.
